title: How to Make a Chicken Broccoli Pasta Salad

steps.headline: Cook the macaroni to al dente.
Add the macaroni, broccoli, pepper, chicken into a large mixing bowl.
Measure and pour the salad dressing in the bowl.
steps.description: If you think it's too much, decrease the amount of dressing. Eyeballing it is a good method to use as a measurement.

steps.headline: Fold in the croutons before serving.

text: Cook the macaroni to al dente. Drain completely. Add the macaroni, broccoli, pepper, chicken into a large mixing bowl.  Measure and pour the salad dressing in the bowl. If you think it's too much, decrease the amount of dressing. Eyeballing it is a good method to use as a measurement. Thoroughly combine the ingredients together.  Fold in the croutons before serving.
